global.commandDisabledGlobally: This command is disabled globally by the developers.
global.serverOnly: You can only use this command in a server.
global.staffOnly: This command is only available to the staff of Cheryl.
global.userMissingPermission: You are missing the following permission: `%Arg%`
global.userMissingRole: You are missing the following role: %Arg%
global.botMissingRole: I am missing the following role: %Arg%

setup.name: Verify
setup.description: Manually verify the age of a member.

response.newVerification: %Arg% just got verified! Please make him feel welcomed~

setup.name: action
setup.description: Do an action (or suggest an image for an action) on a member.

choice.name: choice
choice.description: What action would you like to do?

suggest.name: suggest
suggest.description: Suggest an image to be added to the selected choice.

user.name: member
user.description: Member to target the action towards to.

suggest.wrongUrl: You must provide a valid URL.
suggest.wrongFormat: You must send a valid format. The URL must end with `.jpg`, `.png` or `.gif`.
suggest.alreadyExist: This image has already been suggested/added.
suggest.success: Your image has been successfully sent to the staff of Cheryl.

user.disable: This command has been disabled in this server.
user.notNsfw: You cannot use NSFW command into this channel. This channel must be age-restricted to use this command.

response.noImageFound:
There is no image in the database for the following category: %Arg%

The developers have been alerted!

user.name: user
user.description: User from whom to obtain information.

setup.name: staff
setup.description: Verify if a user is part of the staff of the bot.

setup.name: help
setup.description: Display the commands available (or information about a certain command).

response.description:
The list of command is available on https://cheryl-bot.ca/commands.

There will also be a dashboard there in the future where users may adjust and personalize the bot.

setup.name: avatar
setup.description: Get the avatar of a user.

setup.name: repeat
setup.description: Repeat the message you wish in the VC you are in.

string.name: text
string.description: The text you wish the bot to repeat for you.

error.wrongGuild: You must run the command on the guild you are a VC in.

setup.name: level
setup.description: Show your current progress and level.

setup.name: leaderboard
setup.description: Show the leaderboard of the server.

response.title: Leaderboard of %Arg%
response.noLevel: There is currently nobody with level.

response.timersUp: Thank you for bumping the server! I will remind %Arg% in 2 hours to bump it again.

newTimer.title: Bump Time
newTimer.description:
It's been 2 hours already and it's now time to bump the server!
* Use the command `/bump` from Disboard.
